Package persistence

Class RepositorioColaborador

java.lang.Object
persistence.RepositorioColaborador
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class RepositorioColaborador
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Class responsible for creating a repository to store information about collaborator.
See Also:
